---
title: "List Vendors"
api: "GET https://catalogai.vercel.app/api/vendors"
description: "List all available vendors and their metadata"
---

Retrieve a list of all vendors available in the Catalog API with their associated metadata and product counts.

## Request

<ParamField header="x-api-key" type="string" required>
  Your API key for authentication
</ParamField>

### Query Parameters

<ParamField query="limit" type="number" default="50">
  Number of vendors to return (max 100)
</ParamField>

<ParamField query="page" type="number" default="1">
  Page number for pagination (1-indexed)
</ParamField>

<ParamField query="search" type="string">
  Search vendors by name
</ParamField>

## Response

<ResponseField name="vendors" type="array">
  Array of vendor objects
  
  <Expandable title="Vendor Object">
    <ResponseField name="name" type="string">
      Vendor/brand name
    </ResponseField>
    
    <ResponseField name="product_count" type="number">
      Total number of products from this vendor
    </ResponseField>
    
    <ResponseField name="available_count" type="number">
      Number of currently available products
    </ResponseField>
    
    <ResponseField name="categories" type="array">
      Product categories available from this vendor
    </ResponseField>
    
    <ResponseField name="price_range" type="object">
      Price range information
      
      <Expandable title="Price Range">
        <ResponseField name="min" type="number">
          Minimum price in cents
        </ResponseField>
        
        <ResponseField name="max" type="number">
          Maximum price in cents
        </ResponseField>
        
        <ResponseField name="avg" type="number">
          Average price in cents
        </ResponseField>
      </Expandable>
    </ResponseField>
  </Expandable>
</ResponseField>

<ResponseField name="meta" type="object">
  Pagination and summary metadata
  
  <Expandable title="Meta Properties">
    <ResponseField name="totalVendors" type="number">
      Total number of vendors
    </ResponseField>
    
    <ResponseField name="totalPages" type="number">
      Total number of pages
    </ResponseField>
    
    <ResponseField name="currentPage" type="number">
      Current page number
    </ResponseField>
    
    <ResponseField name="pageSize" type="number">
      Number of items per page
    </ResponseField>
  </Expandable>
</ResponseField>

<RequestExample>

```bash cURL
curl -X GET https://catalogai.vercel.app/api/vendors \
  -H "x-api-key: YOUR_API_KEY"
```

```javascript JavaScript
const response = await fetch('https://catalogai.vercel.app/api/vendors', {
  headers: {
    'x-api-key': 'YOUR_API_KEY'
  }
});

const data = await response.json();
```

```python Python
import requests

response = requests.get(
    'https://catalogai.vercel.app/api/vendors',
    headers={'x-api-key': 'YOUR_API_KEY'}
)

data = response.json()
```

</RequestExample>

<ResponseExample>

```json Response
{
  "vendors": [
    {
      "name": "Sezane",
      "product_count": 245,
      "available_count": 198,
      "categories": [
        "Women > Tops",
        "Women > Dresses",
        "Women > Accessories"
      ],
      "price_range": {
        "min": 2999,
        "max": 49999,
        "avg": 18500
      }
    },
    {
      "name": "Ganni",
      "product_count": 189,
      "available_count": 156,
      "categories": [
        "Women > Dresses",
        "Women > Tops",
        "Women > Outerwear"
      ],
      "price_range": {
        "min": 3999,
        "max": 59999,
        "avg": 22000
      }
    }
  ],
  "meta": {
    "totalVendors": 45,
    "totalPages": 1,
    "currentPage": 1,
    "pageSize": 50
  }
}
```

</ResponseExample>

## Examples

### Search Vendors

Search for vendors by name:

<CodeGroup>

```bash cURL
curl -X GET "https://catalogai.vercel.app/api/vendors?search=Sez" \
  -H "x-api-key: YOUR_API_KEY"
```

```javascript JavaScript
const response = await fetch(
  'https://catalogai.vercel.app/api/vendors?search=Sez',
  {
    headers: {
      'x-api-key': 'YOUR_API_KEY'
    }
  }
);
```

</CodeGroup>

### Paginated Results

Get vendors with pagination:

<CodeGroup>

```bash cURL
curl -X GET "https://catalogai.vercel.app/api/vendors?page=2&limit=25" \
  -H "x-api-key: YOUR_API_KEY"
```

```javascript JavaScript
const response = await fetch(
  'https://catalogai.vercel.app/api/vendors?page=2&limit=25',
  {
    headers: {
      'x-api-key': 'YOUR_API_KEY'
    }
  }
);
```

</CodeGroup>
